00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "strings.h"

00010 // this function takes 2 paths and smashes them together
00011 string combinePaths(string path1, string path2, bool includeLastSlash) {
00012         if(path2 != "" && path2[0] == '/')
00013                 return path2;
00014         
00015         // to compinsate for windows paths we swtich the backslash for
00016         // forward slash
00017         for(int i = 0; i < path1.length(); ++i)
00018                 if(path1[i] == '\\') path1[i] = '/';
00019         for(int i = 0; i < path2.length(); ++i)
00020                 if(path2[i] == '\\') path2[i] = '/';
00021         
00022         // take off the last slash
00023         if(path1.at(path1.length() - 1) == '/')
00024                 path1 = path1.substr(0, path1.length() - 1);
00025         if(path2.at(path2.length() - 1) == '/')
00026                 path2 = path2.substr(0, path2.length() - 1);
00027         
00028         StringList p1 = split('/', path1), p2 = split('/', path2);
00029         for(int i = 0; i < p2.length(); ++i) {
00030                 if(p2[i] == "." || p2[i] == "") {
00031                         // ignore these
00032                 } else if(p2[i] == "..") {
00033                         p1.pop();
00034                 } else p1.push(p2[i]);
00035         }
00036         
00037         if(includeLastSlash)
00038                 return p1.join("/") + "/";
00039         return p1.join("/");
00040 }
